overview: These muscled daddies are ridiculously sexy with a lot of experience under their belt and they're about to give these sexy twinks one hell of a lesson in what it means to be a man. Tough Dads and Bad Lads starring Spencer Reed, JP Dubois, Billy Rubens and more. Watch as these seasoned pros take on younger studs in the father of all fuckfests.
title: Tough Dads & Bad Lads
